Champions League
Valence - Lille: the official teams!
On the occasion of the fourth day of the Champions League, Lille moves to the Estadio de Mestalla to face Valencia. Discover the teams of the meeting!
05 Nov 2019, 19:01 by Charlie Creteur



Lille plays big tonight in Valencia! Just like Jonathan Ikon√©'s equalizer in the first match of the third day of the Champions League (1-1), a reaction will be expected in Spain. Indeed, the Dogues are currently in the last place in the group H with a point while the Naranjas are in the 3rd place synonymous with payout in the Europa League. Discover the teams aligned for this meeting!




The official teams of the meeting:




Albert Celades + 16 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Lille: Maignan - Gabriel - Fonte - Soumaoro - Bradaric - Soumar√© - Andr√© - R√©my - Osimhen - Yazici
Valencia: Cillessen - Wass - Paulista - Garay - Gaya - Kang In - Kondogbia - Parejo - Cheryshev - Rodrigo - Gomez
